name: Albóndigas
instructions: {"type": "doc", "content": [{"type": "orderedList", "attrs": {"start": 1}, "content": [{"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Meter la carne en el robot con las cuchillas puestas."}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Salpimentar"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Echar el resto de ingredientes"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Batir el huevo y echarlo"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Mojar la rebanada de pan en leche y luego echarla en trozos en el robot"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Robot: Velocidad: 5 20s"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Sacar del robot y hacer una masa uniforme"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Dividir en bolas"}]}]}]}]}

name: Berenjenas rellenas
instructions: {"type": "doc", "content": [{"type": "orderedList", "attrs": {"start": 1}, "content": [{"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Cortar a la mitad las berenjenas y luego tajos en forma de cuadros"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Meter las berenjenas 4 minutos en el microondas. Se sabe cuando est\u00e1n hechas porque estar\u00e1n m\u00e1s oscuras (el tiempo puede variar)"}]}, {"type": "orderedList", "attrs": {"start": 1}, "content": [{"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Tambi\u00e9n se pueden meter en el horno hasta que cambien de color"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "En este caso, echarles un chorro de aceite por encima"}]}]}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Picar la cebolla y ponerla a fre\u00edr en una sart\u00e9n."}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Cortar los pimientos (verdes y rojos) en trozos muy peque\u00f1os."}]}, {"type": "orderedList", "attrs": {"start": 1}, "content": [{"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "A cuchillo"}]}]}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Cuando la cebolla lleve un poco en la sart\u00e9n, echar los pimientos."}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Cortar pollo/carne/bonito en trozos peque\u00f1os"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Adobar el pollo/carne"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Sacar lo de dentro de las berenjenas (con forma de dados)"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Echar las berenjenas a la sart\u00e9n"}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Hacer el pollo o la carne en una sart\u00e9n a parte"}]}]}]}]}

name: Brócoli
instructions: {"type": "doc", "content": [{"type": "orderedList", "attrs": {"start": 1}, "content": [{"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Cortar el br\u00f3coli y meterlo en el Leku\u00e9 en el microondas durante 4 minutos."}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Cortar el ajo peque\u00f1o."}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Cortar \"la sustancia\""}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Sofre\u00edr el ajo y antes de que est\u00e9 dorado echar el piment\u00f3n y \u201cla sustancia\u201d."}]}]}, {"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "A continuaci\u00f3n, echar el br\u00f3coli si est\u00e1 fr\u00edo (para que caliente) y mezclarlo."}]}, {"type": "orderedList", "attrs": {"start": 1}, "content": [{"type": "listItem", "content": [{"type": "paragraph", "attrs": {"text_align": "left"}, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Si el br\u00f3coli est\u00e1 hecho al momento, se puede mezclar todo en un cuenco."}]}]}]}]}]}]}
